website_summaries.verdict: Buyers love the workmanship and customization of this option, but you should definitely check it for quality issues right out of the box.
pros: Available in a number of sizes, all the way up to 20 liters
Handcrafted of American white oak, black steel hoops, and a medium charred interior
Customize it with your own text or logo
Easy to prep and get it up and running
cons: Some reports of leaking after a few months
Poor quality in some of these result in cracked or leaking spigots and a crooked stand

customer_reviews.title: Buy with caution!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the barrel in July and it started leaking from the bottom in November. The solution they came up with is use barrel wax. Did not work. They won't replace or return because its out of warranty. The alcohol you place in the barrel is going to take awhile to leak. By the time it starts you will be out of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... both had the customization straight across - not circular like shown in image
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two barrels and both had the customization straight across - not circular like shown in image. Also the letters were engraved in the wood but had no black coloring like shown in the picture. False advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Really? forgot to drill a hole for the spigot?
customer_reviews.text: Barrel looks good, the engraving looks cool but how can you forget to drill a hole for the spigot? I need the barrel to be ready on next Friday. Now I am not sure what they are going to do.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Love the barrel but i received the stand completely crooked ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the barrel but i received the stand completely crooked and poorly made. The barrel wouldn't even fit. I emailed the company and they didn't respond to me. I did finally receive a new stand from them but due to the poor quality of the first one and the fact they couldn't even respond to me I'm eating this a 2 for my time dealing w this and the customer service
customer_reviews.author: Roger N.

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A GREAT PERSONALIZED GIFT TO GIVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait till Christmas!! I just received this personalized barrel today and I am thrilled!! It is a Christmas gift for my son who has his own "man cave", it's perfect. I love that I was able to personalize it for him! It appears to be of very good quality and that it actually holds liquids.....i.e. whiskey!! LOL. It will make for a great entertainment piece for my son and his buddies on game days, poker nights, etc. Also I received it within the time period I was given. Highly recommend as a GREAT gift. I got the 3 liter and it's perfect size to display.
customer_reviews.author: SharIe Cline

customer_reviews.title: It's cool. I had it engraved w/ my name and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's cool. I had it engraved w/ my name and stuff. however to "make" your own barrel aged whiskey it's kind of expensive. You need a natural alcohol and then the enhancer. the alcohol will run anywhere from 15-50 dollars depending on what you buy, and the enhancers are 7-10 dollars. Then there is the time for it to cure in the barrel, honestly it's easier to go to the store and pick out what you want. But it is cool to say you "made" that bottle of whiskey.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Fargen

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Followed the directions to a tee and the finish came off. Then two days later the wood buckled on the back end and burst causing us to lose and entire bottle of whiskey.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for someone or yourself. Cheers.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for a couple months now. I followed the directions about soaking it for a few days. Mine never leaked from them get go. I do try and keep it full. After using it some time, I’ll fill it back up so the wood stays soaked. It added color and flavor just a couple days in. I put a mix of different whiskeys in mine. It’s really nice. I love the way it looks and the way it’s personalized is amazing. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: GREAT little barrel. Fast Service.
customer_reviews.text: I just received my barrel and it looks well made. The engraving is perfect and was delivered on time as a Prime member. There are tiny leaks that the instructions explain as normal and after a few days of being filled with water it should seal up, and I believe it will. The char inside smells great and I think it is going to work nicely for what I have in store. If all goes well I plan to buy another one, but bigger. If there is nothing added to this review here then all leaks sealed and I am digging it.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Moeller

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: I had a murder mystery dinner party set in a 1927 speakeasy theme. I was looking for decorations and props that went well with the era and when I came across these functional aging barrels, I couldn't resist. I love that they're offered in multiple sizes. The fact that I could personalize them was an added bonus. Every one of my guests commented positively on the product and my 3 siblings tried to steal them. I plan to purchase one for each of them as a gift for Christmas this year.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Valenti

customer_reviews.title: The barrels are AWESOME and made great gifts
customer_reviews.text: This is not just a review of the barrels, but also of the company. 5 stars for BOTH! I ordered several barrels of which one barrel ended up cracking a staves from side to side and it didn't retain its contents. Made one email to Sophia's Findings and three days later I was rewarded with a brand new barrel with the same engraving I had ordered! The barrels are AWESOME and made great gifts. Now everybody wants one.... I will be ordering more barrels in the future, even bigger ones as well!
customer_reviews.author: The Feast

customer_reviews.title: Oak Barrel of No quality (((
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oak barrel as a gift for a friend living overseas. For some unforeseen reasons I had to cancel the trip. I kept the barrel until the time I 'd travel to meet my friend. I followed the instructions for the barrel and kept alcohol all the time inside to keep it liquid-proof. One day I discovered that the barrel had become half empty. Then I saw some cracks between the staves. Clearly this barrel cannot hold any liquid at this point. What a disappointment! What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: IP

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I will definitely be ordering again
customer_reviews.text: Delivered just four days after I ordered it including the engraving! I purchased the 3L model and it was exactly as advertised. I didn't follow the instructions exactly. I filled it with cold water for 24 hours and experienced some leakage, I then filled it with warm water and it was tight in under four hours. Great product, I will definitely be ordering again. Maybe the 10L model next.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Miller

customer_reviews.title: For customization I would buy elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is beautiful. Didn’t have a problem with seal. They sealed really good. Some customization was left off on 2 of them. They say they received different info and that is what I got however you get to see a preview of your customization before you place order and my preview was what I was expecting. I plan on buying more for gifts this year but customization is really important to me so I will purchase them through someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly leavitt

customer_reviews.title: leaked after only 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I followed all of the initial procedure to prevent any leaks carefully and the barrel was OK for almost 8 months and now I noticed a leak. One panel of wood is bulging and has a leak in the middle as shown in the picture. This is very disappointing. It takes two years for the whisky to be ready. I have lost a big portion so far.
customer_reviews.author: Beat

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I soaked the barrel for a full week plus two days of hot water changing it twice a day. It appeared to be sealed. Then I put n 2 liters of bourbon and it drips all over the counter. I tried barrel wax and it still leaks from two of the rings leaving black spots on the counter. Been leaking for nearly a month. I doubt there will be any alcohol left in another month. Save your money buy somewhere else the quality is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Xmas gift

customer_reviews.title: Follow the instructions
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good. I'd have given it a 5 but their choice of shipping leaves a lot to be desired. I've purchased 5 of these and every one had shipping communication issues. They were only a day or two late, but they waited for the last second to tell me they were going to be. when you don't like packages sitting on the porch for long periods of time, communication with the carrier is the key. They have none. Switch carriers and you have 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Kick Ass is all I can say. I have ordered many barrels and all of them have leaked for days before they sealed up and some never stop leaking. This barrel leaked for about a minute. I am impressed with the engraving and the timeliness of receiving my keg. Awesome! I will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing, functions ok...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our wedding unity ceremony. Was delivered quick, and looked amazing! We were very impressed, as were all of our guests. This is a great barrel for show, but will not work for aging any alcohol, as over time the barrel leaks. I followed the instructions for sealing the barrel, leaving water in it over a series of days, however after leaving water in it a few days the outside was molding. :/ We love it for decor, not so much for function. Would highly recommend for decor!
customer_reviews.author: Allysen Shaughnessy

customer_reviews.title: Roll out the barrel!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband. He loves it! The Barrel is very nicely crafted. Followed the enclosed instructions on how to seal, and it sealed quickly. The personalization was beautifully done. Aging a whiskey now, after two weeks in could, we already started to see and taste the aging.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly7

customer_reviews.title: Spirits evaporated/leaked?
customer_reviews.text: I bought a barrel for our wedding with engraving. The idea was to age our own whiskey for the first year of our marriage. I have had friends who have done this and it works well. We followed all instructions and filled it with a large bottle of Jameson, turning the barrel and soaking it per instructions. The wood eventually distorted and as of 9 months later, our whiskey was completely evaporated or leaked...we aren’t sure which. But we lost a large amount of time and money on this product. It looks nice, but I’d never buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Very cute little barrel
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It is very cute and the engraved writing is crisp. It was sealed completely after a day. I will put a pinot noir in it for 6 months and see how it goes. Ultimately I will age beer in it after I get some wine and eventually bourbon flavors into this barrel. Update- still going well! Sealed up. I had a Chablis in it for 3 monthels and have had a blond ale in it for 3 month, soon to keg. Next will be a red wine before aging another Homebrew. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba nuts

customer_reviews.title: Quality Barrel
customer_reviews.text: I have a few barrels from different companies, and this one is by far the best. It has a lighter char, but that is not always a bad thing. It just means I needed to age everything longer then with my other barrels. I didn't have any problems with leaking like I've had with other barrels, and the personalized engraving was a very nice touch. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking to make their own spirits or age store bought spirits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for every whiskey drinker!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I got this for a buddy of mine who is a whiskey fanatic. Took a little longer than expected to completely seal up, but when it did he filled it with some bulleit bourbon. He let is sit for 11 days and just today we filled two glasses of bulleit, one from the bottle and the other from the barrel......HOLY COW can you taste the difference in just that time. SO much smoother and had a more floral taste. Easily turned a $30 bottle of bourbon into a $80 bottle!!!
customer_reviews.author: The legend

customer_reviews.title: One Happy Camper !
customer_reviews.text: My expectations weren't very high when I ordered the 2 litre barrel but I was pleasantly surprised when it arrived. It looks great and has a good solid built feel. The customizing was exactly as I had ordered. I followed directions, rinsed it out then filled with water. It's been close to a month and it hasnt leaked a drop since day one. I definitely plan on purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: James B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, quality gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a truly pleasant surprise. It made an amazing gift to my husband who likes to imagine he is a connoisseur. Beautiful decoration if nothing else, but certainly is functional as well. Just remember to follow the instructions it comes with in order to keep your barrel in prime condition.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: On the fence? Get off. From the minute you take it out of the box, you just know. So well built. The personalization was perfectly burnt into the wood, all fittings perfectly snug, and the aroma of oak blasts you as soon as you open the well packaged barrel. Just perfect. Thanks so much.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie N

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. If you read the instructions and fill ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. If you read the instructions and fill it with water inside and wet the outside until all leaks stop, you can add your favorite alcoholic beverage and it will not leak. This came nicely engraved and after about 3 days of stacking all leaks went away. This product is fantastic. I bought 2 and am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: iolanta kovaler-akerlind

customer_reviews.title: Leaky Spigot Beware!
customer_reviews.text: The spigot drips constantly. I have to tilt the barrel up to keep I from dripping and cannot fill to the max. I have emailed the company twice, but never heard back from them. Not very happy at this point. I did everything that was recommended to cure the barrel. I am probably more agricated that I have not gotten a reply from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Disgruntled Barrel Owner

customer_reviews.title: Took longer to receive than I thought it would but ...
customer_reviews.text: Took longer to receive than I thought it would but it was worth the wait. The spigot leaked during the initial sealing process, but once I filled it with my first batch of whiskey, it sealed up and hasn't leaked a drop since. Can't wait to try my first glass of aged whiskey in about a year from now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat disappointed in the quality. One of the bands was crooked and the stand was missing the little accent domed pieces as illustrated in the picture. Engraving was nice. Purchased as a Christmas gift, so I was counting on it to be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. Though I am still hydrating the barrel it is the perfect 1 gallon barrel. If nothing else it looks really cool. The personalization is a great touch. I am excited to age a wine in this barrel. I’ll probably have to order a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Jarett Reinmann

customer_reviews.title: A Must buy
customer_reviews.text: We asked to add a logo thru direct message beyond all the inscriptions and they did it for us no problem. 100% great product and quality craftsmanship!!! Came exacrly how it shows in pic plus some! Customer service is 100%
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Follow the instructions!
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing gift idea! It’s not just for show, you can actually prep the barrel to put your favorite whiskey in it. Will absolutely do this as another gift for someone!
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Trashy product!
customer_reviews.text: Awful products. I bought item for my fiancee on valentine's day as a gift. It was embarrassing because while filling with his favorite whiskey, the container began to leak all over the place and almost an entire bottle of his whiskey was wasted. They should be ashamed to sell anyone such a poorly made product!
customer_reviews.author: tunisha gilbert

customer_reviews.title: The service from Sofia's Findings was excellent. They were patient with multiple edits for the ...
customer_reviews.text: The service from Sofia's Findings was excellent. They were patient with multiple edits for the laser etching and they were very prompt in both reply and in sending it out. For this I give them a 5/5. The product was also as described. My only dis-satisfaction was the high cost of shipping but shipping to Thailand is not cheap. Bottom line: If you live in North America and do not have to worry about long distance shipping then Sofia's Finding is a 5/5 score.
customer_reviews.author: Black Ivory Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Turned out absolutely amazing I never put liquid in it so not sure if mine leaks I seen alot of people having problems with that. But as it just sit as it is its awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I understand this product is handcrafted, which was part of the appeal in ordering. Perhaps the craftsman was rushed due to the holiday season or a novice, but the quality of the barrel was disappointing. We won’t be giving it as a gift, as was intended. There were “chunks” of wood on the exterior that had not been removed from the barrel before the bands were attached. The spigot was flakey with what appeared to be an excess of varnish. The spigot (or the lettering) was off center. Great concept, unique gift idea, but needs improvement in quality.
customer_reviews.author: DLL

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for Christmas for my husband and it turned out beautiful. Only issue he had was I misspelled his name and that was totally my fault., lol.. He has been using it and we have had no problems at all. The quality is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: breidi69

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this barrel (2L) as a gift for my boyfriend, and he absolutely loved it! It took a while to prep and set up, but it had no leaks. The engraving was just how I wanted it. The barrel looks fantastic and works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Makes for a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for our anniversary. He has tried multiple whiskeys in it and enjoys the taste the barrel gives them. The engraving turned out great. He gets so many compliments on it when we have guests over.
customer_reviews.author: Keely

customer_reviews.title: A really nice barrel
customer_reviews.text: The personalized lettering was very nice. The barrel is very attractive and well built. It is too early to tell about the aging but so far the barrel is functioning perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph F.

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. It came quickly and personalize just as I ordered. Husband prepped and filled with spirits, does not leak. Makes a great conversational piece.
customer_reviews.author: M.Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very good barrel
customer_reviews.text: Great little product. Had an issue with crack in the spigot but the company sent be 3 to replace it! Definitely follow the instructions on filling with water a few days first. Personalization was spot on.
customer_reviews.author: J. Buck

customer_reviews.title: Great whiskey barrel
customer_reviews.text: My guy loved this customized whiskey barrel! I was happy that it came w instructions so it’s properly treated to ensure it lasts a long while. Perfect size, great product!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, wont hold fluid due to split tap.
customer_reviews.text: Got it, tap is cracked. Leaks terribly. Basically cant use it. Just leave it on the counter to look cool. Personalzation was great. Just not useable. Kind a feel like I just bout an expensive decoration.
customer_reviews.author: lucas kudrna

customer_reviews.title: This barrel is awesome, the laser cutting was perfect
customer_reviews.text: This barrel is awesome, the laser cutting was perfect. The only problem we had was a tiny pin hole leak that was a fault in the wood not craftsmanship, we just put a little glue in it and it worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jenae

customer_reviews.title: Well crafted. Sturdy. Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Filled up with water once, only 1 very very small leak. Should shut tight completely soon. Engraved fonts are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Rj

customer_reviews.title: Misspelled!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 6 of them for gifts. The ones that were spelled correctly were nice. 2 of them were misspelled. I reached out to them via amazon and never heard back!
customer_reviews.author: John Kim

customer_reviews.title: You will have to soak the barrel before it’s usable, so order in advance!
customer_reviews.text: I was so incredibly pleased with the quality and appearance of my customized barrel. It was a gift for my fiancé, and I’ve used it to barrel age cocktails for him. After use, I can say it holds up great with no issues so far. Also, it’s aestietically a great addition to our shelves by the bar where we keep it on display. Highly recommend for the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B Coe

customer_reviews.title: Great engravement
customer_reviews.text: I was more than pleased. The engravemenr was good, I love how they geve you directions on what to do to get the barrel cured so it does not leak and sits perfect on the stand, I am more than happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: tia40501

customer_reviews.title: do not look like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought two barrels, do not look like the picture, specially the stand. The spots on both barrels fell off and one was missing the black hoop around it. The sellers reply was that i should hammer the spouts in, the I noticed the missing hoop around one of the barrels. It wont look good with missing hoop on anyone's bar, not even as a decorative piece. I doubt if I will tell them to put anything in them either, probably leaks. Next time i will buy from someone reputable rather than these people.DONT ORDDER.....waste of my hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Doris L. Gulmatico

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected. Went to arts/crafts expo and saw much, much larger ones for higher but close to same price. Disappointed with size.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: Whiskey lover approved!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a whiskey lover and they absolutely loved it! It is small but the lettering was very well done and clear. Not sure how it held up with fermenting whiskey since it was a gift, but as far as appearance/quality, I give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jones

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift for someone who has everything
customer_reviews.text: We got this for a neighbor who has everything. Makes quite an impression. My only regret is that we didn't go for the bigger size. Very nice detail.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sigmund

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: balsamic vinegar I aged is amazing. batch 2 working now
customer_reviews.author: Chris Collins

customer_reviews.title: Tequila Evaporated
customer_reviews.text: I purchased (2) 750ml of tequila in Mexico and thought the barrel would be great to store and age the tequila but it all evaporated instead and the gloss finished does not stay because of the constant water that has to be applied.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Making perfect Negroni in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: No issues at all. Delivered fast no spelling mistakes on custom engraving text. Clear instructions of use were included.
customer_reviews.author: iryna makarevich

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful decor, not recommended for use
customer_reviews.text: Very small. My fault for not knowing alcohol quantities. But, very cute decorative pieces and looks great on mantle.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Gatchel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's adorable!! Personalized and everything. Works great. Make sure to follow the directions. Great seller.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Nozzle leaks no matter what we have done to try to correct it.
customer_reviews.text: The design is very cute, but the nozzle leaks all the time. We cured it as instructed and have tried to recure it, even have tried to glue in the aluminum insert. But it still leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Harry workman

customer_reviews.title: Get U 1
customer_reviews.text: This keg is amazing , very well made super impressed !
customer_reviews.author: Marc Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a doctor who works at our office and he loves it. He actually takes it with him when he travels by car to a different city. He is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: maria andrews

customer_reviews.title: ... got a 2 liter thinking it would be a good size, but it was quiet small but i ...
customer_reviews.text: I got a 2 liter thinking it would be a good size, but it was quiet small but i would recommend it! Looks cute as decor
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and excellent customer service. Love the look and feel of the barrel plus it is the real deal. Turn to shine into a nice bourbon in about 90 days. Had a slight problem with the barrel at first excellent customer service to resolved. Highly recommend. Bought the 10 L just wish they made a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: A very cool personalized gift
customer_reviews.text: Very fast turnaround for a customizable product, the barrel came exactly as described with the customization I requested in three days. Made for a great and unique housewarming gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Don't waster your money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband for Christmas. It will not seal and it leaks. In addition, we think it was a recycled one as it has a wine color liquid coming out of it. Wrote a review to the company and have't heard a word. Save your money and but elsewhere. Huge disappointment!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Ordonia

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Good instructions for sealing. Overall quality is pretty good. The base broke I had to glue it. The engraving is flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Natale

customer_reviews.title: If you want to be known as the best gift giver, give this.
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping and as advertised. For the spirit lover, it’s a thoughtful gift for the price of a gift card. Takes a little work to cure the barrels if you want to do yourself and load with a spirit of choice for your giftee. Plan on 5 days to cure and at least 7 days to age the spirit. It’s a labor of love. But it is literally the gift that keeps on giving. Get the 2 liter as a minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Tequila
customer_reviews.text: I order this one to age my tequila blanco, it gets great flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great gimmick if you don’t plan on using for liquid
customer_reviews.text: Intended on using this to make bourbon , everything was great until i actually Put liquid in it it leaked and wept until i had To empty the barrel out, i emailed The company almost a week ago and haven’t gotten any sort of response back so here we are now.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great.... but Ours Cracked and Leaked.
customer_reviews.text: After following the conditioning/waterproofing steps exactly, the barrel developed a crack across one of the wood staves that leaked. Also, the paint on the metal hoops bleeds into the wood and detracts from the look of the barrel. Two stars rather than one, as the seller refunded money without hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Very cool barrel. It's hard to figure size of this without seeing it next to something or in person. I ordered the 3L I would probably order a bigger one just on looks alone if I order another one. And yes it is actually useable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: came with brilliant instructions, really good quality and worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and unique.
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for husband who loves it. Found it to be a unique gift and even sent pics of it to his friends. Definitely recommend this seller. Great idea for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: MAD

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great but not functional
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Prepared the cask with water as instructed. When bourbon was put in it leaked. Iron staves tarnish from the leaking. Looks great but no functional from my experience and I followed the directions to the letter!!
customer_reviews.author: Bflostad

customer_reviews.title: Working out great
customer_reviews.text: Engraving was perfect. Sealed up perfect when I followed instructions. Looks good on our kitchen shelf. Husband enjoyed getting it as a unique gift
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: The postman just dropped my oak barrell off. The ...
customer_reviews.text: The postman just dropped my oak barrell off. The engraving is beaitiful! We selected the Old English font. Be sure not to make the wording too long or the font size will shrink.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice present
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my fiancé’s bday. He loves it. Very well made. He likes to pour the alcohol inside and then start drinking right away. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Anny Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Such a cool barrel! I ordered on a Monday
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool barrel! I ordered on a Monday, got shipment notification the following Monday and received it by Thursday. The engraving is seriously top notch. I was surprised at how small 2L is but it's a great size to fit on your counter or bar and not take up a ton of real estate. We followed the instructions and have not seen it leak yet. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold fluid.
customer_reviews.text: We could not bet the Barrel to hold our drinks. We followed all instructions and it just kept leaking. The short time the drink was in the barrel we could tell it had flavor from the wood. I tried to contact the sellers but no reply.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Vacek

customer_reviews.title: Began leaking after second use
customer_reviews.text: Small leak that wasn’t issue with first use but by second full barrel a large leak had started (6 months after purchase). Kept bottle full with water and alcohol between uses.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Great seller, actually cares and easily resolves issues.
customer_reviews.text: This review is more about the seller than the product. I had an issue with something I bought, and 10 months later, they handled it better than I could have expected. I’m very very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous barrels, these
customer_reviews.text: Every barrel I’ve ordered from Sofia’s has been fantastic. They all have been well put together, looked amazing, and never had leaking problems. I would recommend these over all other suppliers.
customer_reviews.author: Corbin S. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 & 5 liter, both sealed up as designed, now the wait
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, ordered on one day and receive it in 2 days after.
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: filling it twice a day it took about 5 days ...
customer_reviews.text: filling it twice a day it took about 5 days to seal. Follow the instructions. Will age some 100 proof moonshine and report back.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Labarre

customer_reviews.title: Just wish I had gotten the larger
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my son’s 40th birthday. I was pretty impressed I hope he is too!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Blair

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: We’ve purchased 6 of these for us and family over the past year. They’ve always arrived quickly and performed excellently. We’ve used them to age Old Fashioned’s. We use them each 3 times before discarding them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K.

customer_reviews.title: he loved it. He didn't use it yet so can't ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift to my friend, he loved it. He didn't use it yet so can't tell if it can be used but looks good.
customer_reviews.author: biorobtan

customer_reviews.title: Great barrel!
customer_reviews.text: Great personalization. Needed a new spiget assembly they sent me a new one wthin a week Great looking barrel, nice chared.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Besson

customer_reviews.title: Birthday blues
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sister's bday It leaked around the seals And they followed all prep instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and said best birthday present ever
customer_reviews.author: USMC Ret

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking. No leak at first filled water
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. No leak at first filled water. No leak for first filled bourbon, but the center part of the barrel start expending. 2nd filled bourbon having some sticky bubbles coming out thru barrel head. Not from the letter side, from the blank barrel head side.
customer_reviews.author: Jian C.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all costs
customer_reviews.text: Followed their instructions exactly and the barrel warped, cracked, and led to all liquid evaporating. Their customer service is nonexistent. Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: garyg

customer_reviews.title: the stand is the problem
customer_reviews.text: After the third stand, I gave up. The barrel is nice, but the stand is much lesser quality, doesn't sit properly...the personalization was lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Gave my boyfriend this personalized barrel for Christmas. He followed all the directions. Put the single barrel of Bourbon, went to the grocery store. And returned to a puddle of expensive bourbon on all over the floor. This is a terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: dianna freckmann

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gift
customer_reviews.text: This came lightning fast (2 days early!) and looks far better than I could have hoped for!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey DeLay

customer_reviews.title: Nope.....
customer_reviews.text: Many leaks, not water tight even after 2 weeks of cure time. Novelty only
customer_reviews.author: HydraShock

customer_reviews.title: But I love the tank
customer_reviews.text: The bottom base it’s bigger than the tank. But I love the tank.
customer_reviews.author: odette  inastrilla

product_meta.title: Personalized - Customized American White Oak Aging Barrel - Barrel Aged (2 Liters, Black Hoops)
feature_bullets: Handcrafted American White Oak Wood Barrel | Laser Engraved
Black Steel Hoops | Medium Charred Interior | 2 Liters American Oak Aging Barrel | Barrel Capacity is an approximate
Perfect to age your own spirits, whiskey, wine, beer, rum, tequila, honey, vinegar...or as Home Decoration
90 Day Warranty | Instructions to cure & seal must be follow prior to using it
Optional: Any type of engraving allowed (logos, graphics, etc), please send us engraving instructions after purchase & type in "Will send LOGO"
